multiplechoiceresponse.p: Create a new dashboard in Trainingland. Under the “Search for items to add to this dashboard” field, search for ‘RMNCAH’ and add five visualizations of your choice to the dashboard.

label.h3: When the items are added to the dashboard, how do they appear in the dashboard?

choicegroup.choice: The items are ordered by the date they were created
The items are stacked one on top of the other with the most recent selection on top

div.p: When items are added to a dashboard, they are stacked one on top of the other with the most recent selection on top. The order of dashboard items can be modified. Dashboard items can be dragged and dropped to the desired location and resized as well.
